content: I noticed that mistreatment became the norm, and it continued with Anna asking me to rap a song for one of the board members at the quarterly company dinner. To be fair, this was a rap that I’d written for youth across America in relation to a social impact campaign the organization was deploying. I wrote the rap for fun, and more importantly for the youth. I didn’t write it to entertain board members; furthermore, I wasn’t getting paid to rap . These are just two of many instances that made it clear I was on the margin.
